hero.title: Natural Language Powered
hero.subtitle: Type a sentence, and AI automatically generates professional mind maps, flowcharts, data charts, architecture diagrams, and more. Six specialized agents cover all your visualization needs.

features.sectionSubtitle: Each agent focuses on a specific visualization domain, orchestrated by LangGraph

mindmap.title: Mind Map
mindmap.desc: Automatically analyzes topic structure and generates multi-level mind maps with expand/collapse and export

flowchart.title: Flowchart
flowchart.desc: Transforms business processes and algorithm logic into clear React Flow diagrams

chart.title: Data Charts
chart.desc: Supports bar, line, pie, radar and 20+ chart types with ECharts

drawio.title: Architecture Diagram
drawio.desc: Generates professional system architecture and network topology diagrams with AWS/Azure/GCP icons

mermaid.title: Mermaid Diagrams
mermaid.desc: Supports sequence, Gantt, class, state diagrams and more with Mermaid syntax

infographic.title: Infographic
infographic.desc: Transforms data and information into beautiful visual infographics for presentations and sharing
